member.name: T:GEMPS.BO.Contact
member.summary: Represents an instance of Contact.

member.name: P:GEMPS.BO.Contact.PhoneNumber
member.summary: The string containing this Contact phone number(s). It can be about more than one phone number, they just have to be formated as one string.

member.name: P:GEMPS.BO.Contact.POBox
member.summary: The string containing this Contact PO Box.

member.name: P:GEMPS.BO.Contact.Email
member.summary: The string containing this Contact email(s). It can be about more than one email, they just have to be formated as one string.

member.name: P:GEMPS.BO.Contact.Fax
member.summary: The string containing this Contact fax number(s). It can be about more than one fax number, they just have to be formated as one string.

member.name: P:GEMPS.BO.Contact.Facebook
member.summary: This Contact facebook account.

member.name: M:GEMPS.BO.Contact.#ctor
member.summary: Represents an instance of Contact with none-initialized properties.

member.name: M:GEMPS.BO.Contact.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Represents an instance of Contact.
member.param: The string containing this Contact phone number(s). It can be about more than one phone number, they just have to be formated as one string.
The string containing this Contact PO Box.
The string containing this Contact email(s). It can be about more than one email, they just have to be formated as one string.
The string containing this Contact fax number(s). It can be about more than one fax number, they just have to be formated as one string.
This Contact facebook account.

member.name: M:GEMPS.BO.Contact.#ctor(GEMPS.BO.Contact)
member.summary: Represents an instance of Contact having the copy of properties values from another existing Contact instance.
member.param: The Contact instance from which the properpies values will be copied.

member.name: M:GEMPS.BO.Contact.GetHashCode
member.summary: A redefinition of the string.GetHashCode() method.
member.returns: Returns the hash code for this Contact instance Id value.

member.name: M:GEMPS.BO.Contact.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether this instance and another specified Contact object are the same, referring to their Ids values.
member.param: The other Contact object to compare with this instance.
member.returns: Returns a Boolean (true or false) value.

member.name: M:GEMPS.BO.Contact.ToString
member.summary: A redefinition of the string.ToString() method.
member.returns: Returns a string that represents the current Contact object.
